api_list.name: post-add_suppliers
api_list.description:
{id_currency} like 1 for euro
{id_country} like 81 for Germany
{id_supplier_term} see below
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wms13.p.rapidapi.com/suppliers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wms13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get-order_refunds
api_list.description: Retry to print one PrintQueue after a first failure

api_list.name: complete_mass_print_batch_in_progress
api_list.description:
Check available stock for every order preparations of the batch and change their status to "done" if stock is available.
Possibility to exclude some order preparations from the batch.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Batch id from which to complete order preparations

api_list.name: post-supplier_comments_id
